text: The Billboard Tropical Songs is a chart that ranks the best-performing tropical songs of the United States. Published by Billboard magazine, the data are compiled by Nielsen Broadcast Data Systems based on each single's weekly airplay. ==Chart history== {| class="wikitable" !Issue date !Song !Artist(s)
